content.detailedDescription:
My sighting starts when i was in my living room sitting on my couch which faces away from the main window over looking my front yard.  i got up to get something from the kitchen when i noticed something odd-looking out the window.  i moved closer for a better look when i realized whatever this was, wasn't normal.  so i walked outside onto my front porch to get a better look.  

the first thing i saw was a large triangle with red and white lights.  the red lights blinked every so often.  the sides of the triangle weren't flat, they were thicker and more cylindricle, but it was deffinitly still a triangle.  i think noticed that there were two others just like it.  the first one flew diagnaly down my street to a cellphone tower you can see from my porch.  the other flew parallel to it and the third flew over my home.  i looked back up the street and a few minutes later another flew down my street.  

at first i thought this might be just a weird airplane flight pattern or something explainable.  but what made me realized that it could be something else, was the fact that a few minutes, the first two ships flying parallel came together by the cellphone tower.  the one that i first noticed went straight toward the water tower and a few minutes later, the one that flew parallel came over top of it and they hovered right on top of each other for several minutes.  i never saw how they left because i started to notice something else. 

ever few minutes another would come down the street, all from the same direction, but each one would get a little closer and closer to the tree tops.  i also saw stars move.  it sounds crazy, but they moved.  they looked like normal stars.  bright, un-moving, un-blinking, and they didn't have that unnatural light that satilites do.  you could stare at them for a while and they would just seem like normal stars.  but then, two started to move.  it wasn't particularly fast but it was brisk.  unlike the triangle ships, they would go in all different directions.  once they started to move some would blink white and others would stay a solid glowing white.  

after this, i lost count of how many triangles and stars i saw.   i saw one triangle that was practicly in the treetops of my neighbor across the road.  if i had heard or saw the treetops move, i would believe that they were deffinitly in the treetops.  i didn't see where this one came from but it was accending into the sky at a very slow rate. next,and i still have no idea why i did this, i did try to signal them.  i turned off the porch light and the main light over my landing.  i think turned my porch light on then off three times.  i did this twice.  i didnt feel any fear or hesitation when i did this.  it felt like the normal thing to do, like i should do it.  it was a few minutes later that i noticed one of the starts was unusually close to me.  it was around the perimiter of my yard and it blinking white until it came across this one big tree next to my drive way.  it then started to blink red.  it was almost as if it was facing me, or at least my home, while it flew around the back side of my house.  no other star had ever blinked red.  

after this i started to feel like there was a pressure on my chest and it became slightly more difficult for me to breath.  i started to get scared so i went back inside after about another two minutes.  i would have believed this was a freak flight pattern for planes if it wasn't for the amount of ships i saw (i estimate no less then a dozen), the star-ships, the two that came together, and the one that cirlced my home.  i've always thought that life on other planets existed, that it was logical.  i never really thought to much about ufo's though, which really added to the shock of seeing this.  of course i felt absolutly no shock, fear, or confusion until after i went back inside.  while i was outside, it just felt comfortable until after the red blinking star ship disapeared behind my home.  this occured for about 20 minutes between 7:20-7:40pm (approximetly), on thursday february 9th, 2012.
content.summary: About a dozen or so ships and star-like things filled the sky around my home.

content.detailedDescription: I catch alot of web cam pictures of ufos over nyc/nj why they are here i have no clue? my skeptics tell me they are planes and or helicopters or boats. well look at these pictures, look at how large they are over these big buildings??? they are not planes and helicopters...There from other worlds and they are here!!! ...Look for yourself and make up your own minds...Watch the skies...Marko333 :-)
content.summary: Planes ahhh no way...Ufos...Yes !!!!

content.detailedDescription: I was near sand lake with my friend jeff, we had set up a pop-up blind earlier in the day (very near a sea osprey preserve) in hopes of scoring a big buck. after midnite we walked from the back side of my grandfather's property to the area near where we had put the blind. the area of the osprey preserve is roughly the size of a football field and it is wide open wetland inside of that area. it is surrounded by trees. as jeff and i came in through the trees we were about 50 feet from the open area, when we saw what we thought were 2 sets of headlights. i shined my spotlight at them, and jeff got angry, because we thought they were the dnr(department of natural resources), which spells trouble for two hunters in the middle of the night. as soon as i spotlighted what we thought were atvs the lights moved faster than anything i have ever seen, through the trees right up to twenty feet in front of us and hovered, at head leval. we were both armed with full magazines, with our guns aimed at the light that was directly in front of each of us. we were paralized standing for approx. 10 minutes. we got a good look at them, but they are difficult to describe. they were the size of a volleyball and seemed to be melting neon light, pink,purple,deep blue,and green. and as i said we couldnt move at all. i remember being stuck like that for what seemed like two minutes, but to jeff seemed more like ten minutes. it let go of us at the same time and we fell down, and clawed dirt trying to get away, until we both had a big tree at our backs. as we were on the ground the lights had moved with us, still maintainig the 20 foot distance from us. then all at once it ascended so fast you almost couldnt see it doing it, like in the blink of the eye. this really happened. jeff was former military with security clearance and he said that it was not man made, and had never seen anything like it.-fred babcock
content.summary: Very close encounter witnessed by myself, and honerable ex-military

content.detailedDescription:
I was working third shift and went to the parking lot for lunch break which i take in my car. this happened on 09-29-11 at around 3:00 am. while getting into my car i noticed out of the corner of my left eye a very bright glowing object coming from the east at about 500 to 700 feet in the air. it moved very slow in a direct line and pulsated making no sound. it flew right directly above me and moved westward just south of the dayton international airport near where i work. i watched it start to shoot up at about a 45 degree angle and slowly dissipeared out of site. i took a picture of it when it moved over above my head but the cell phone picture didn't come out very good and the object looked s shped in the pic.
never seen anything like it and consider my self lucky to see something unexplainable and i,ll never forget it as long as i live.
content.summary: Object came from the east over the business i work at on third shift. a orange glowing pulsating boomarang shape craft with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Williamston mi, around 730 at night, girlfriend and i were on our way to the gym. avid sky watcher, whenever i can i look to the stars. it was a pretty clear night, she was driving and i was staring out the front passenger window. i noticed two star like lights that were parallel to eachother moving at about the same speed as us. they were about 3-4 inches apart from ground level. they flashed at the same time, and moved at the same rate. when we came to a stop sign i pointed out the two lights to my girlfriend. now the lights were directly in front of us. suddenly another light appeared, now there is three flashing lights in a triangle formation all about three to four inches apart. as we continue to watch, the three lights flashed again, only when they flashed back on there was about six to ten lights in a cluster around the original three. as they flashed they separated from the cluster. almost like they all flew in different directions. eventually we lost sight of objects behind trees. myself and my girlfriend both agreed that we've never seen anything like this, and its probably a once in a lifetime situations. it was pretty cool to say the least.
content.summary: Many small star sized lights

content.detailedDescription:
For the second night my family and i have watched a cluster of pinpoint lights with one light moving around within the cluster.
i was able to capture the one pinpoint light that moved on my cell phone movie camera but the cluster is not as bright as the one that moves so the cluster does not show.  i live in huntsville, al. 35803.  tonight it was almost directly overhead west of the milky way.  this is not in earth���s atmosphere.  it is out in space.
content.summary: For the second night my family and i have watched a cluster of pinpoint lights with one light moving around within the cluster.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking dwon to my moms. less then 500 yards away. i havent seen a ufo in weeks. was looking up and saw a white orb like ufo zoom slow speed below clouds in a straight line. it slowed down when it was getting into the same area as a plane that was going to the near by air port. the ufo was not as high up as the plane. once it got say beside the plane when looking up.(but was way under it. the ufo slowed down and cut right. went threw a cloud and stayed there over my property. it turned a light orange color once it cut right. when it was over my property it stayed there for a few minutes then disappeared.

i saw a really low huge cargo plane today as well. (around 2)so low i thought it was going to crash into the mountain. but i never saw it explode or go over the mountain. weird. then a black helicopter(around 4:30). lots of helicopters lately. we had five here very low about a week ago. weird stuff.
content.summary: Straight then came back and hovered

content.detailedDescription: I have seen this star like light in the sky above my farm many times in the past few months first seen it as reported before 1-4-2012, adn have seen it every two to three night ,i was able to set up my teloscope and zoom in (450x) and it is still hard to make out a shape but i see red blue green white lights there are to red lights on top the flash the hole time the other blue white and green light around the edge and they flash at random
content.summary: Bright light in teloscope

content.detailedDescription: I was working in my shop in my back yard and heard a low flying jet plane flying over.  there is a lot of military and commercial traffic over my house  and i went out to take a look at the aircraft.  i could not see the jet yet but could hear it, and as i was looking in the sky for the jet i noticed a bright white light moving to the south east of my position.  the light was as bright as the sun but very small, silent and about three to five miles from my position.  it was moving from clear blue sky towards clouds to the south. i was facing east at the time.  i ran to get my camera and just caught it before it moved into the clouds fully, i tried to set up a second shot but it was too late as the object moved into the thick of the clouds.  other than the clouds to the south the sky was completely clear bright and sunny. i then looked at the picture and barely saw the object on the lcd screen, but when i zoomed into the object it was very different from what i expected to see.  i expected to see a plane and not the object that i was looking at, it also seemed to have three points of light and not just one as i observed.  i was actually very excited by the picture, but remembered to also take a picture of the military jet as it passed over.  it seemed to be on approximately the same course as the object but flying very low as they sometimes do. i have the original picture and all of the exif data from the camera. i hope that this report helps!
content.summary: Bright white light larger than a star moving south east from my position, from clear sky towards clouds

content.detailedDescription:
Placing cam on tripod left unattended and fiming approx 40 mins.
upon reviewing at 22 min mark a dark ring like "probe" is seen first going straight up, ascending, and 2-3 seconds later object is descending. upon descent object had turned slightly giving another view different angle. 
this was approx 9-9:30 am weathre conditions in san antonio, tx cloudy an hazy. please see pics. video to be uploaded yt,
content.summary: Camera on tripod, general filming area, probe object filmed

content.detailedDescription: My wife called me outside at 7:15 pm on the evening of wed. feb. 8, 2012 to observe a light that was moving across the eastern sky in a north-south direction. i grabbed the camera and attempted to get a few photos before it disappeared. the best of the group is included. it is the bright light in the center of the photo. it stopped and then ascended. it then headed east and disappeared. guessing its speed, elevation and distance is difficult because it was further away than it normally is. i'm guessing that it was at least 1/2 mile distant and of a similar height. we observed it for 3-4 minutes. no emissions, appendiges or noise was experienced.
content.summary: Wife and i viewed light moving in the eastern sky (no-so). it stopped, ascended and then headed east with no visible emissions, apendiges or noise.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to put something in the mail box when i saw a bright white light in the sky above my neighbors house off in the distance.  i looked at it for a second and it changed to a bright orange color and started to pulsate.  i went inside to get my mom and her boyfriend and they both saw it for at least 5 minutes then when back inside.  i continued to look at the object taking several pictures on my cell phone.  it wouldn't stay in one spot, but hover around some, ascending and descending and pulsating for at least 30 mins.  a few times it completely flickered off and back on again.  after about 30-45 minutes it went below my field of vision behind my neighbors house.  when i looked at the pictures i had taken, i noticed, besides the ufo, another green light higher up in the sky, which was not visible to the naked eye but showed up in the pictures.
content.shape: Diamond,   Disc,   Egg,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Long, quiet,  hovered stationary sometimes ascending and descending

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was on my way home from work i look up and see 3 lights. at first i just thought they were stars and dismissed them but not even 10 secounds later i relize its night threre is cloud cover i cannot see any stars at the time i look back up the light on the far left shoots straight up and the one on the far left seems to "collide" with the one in the center and then that one got larger and started glowing red and orange. and about this time military helicopters and jets start filling the sky.
2. i first noticed the object becouse i was looking at the stars and it seemed a little to large to be a star.
3. i thought it was a star
4. the first object flew straight up the object in the middle stayed still and the last one collided with the one in the middle
5. i was in awe i stoped walking and just watched it for about 20 min counted all the planes that flew by and wondered what the "excuse" would be in the local news
6. after about 20 min i started walking again keeping my eyes on it i think the clouds may have shifted or something because it seemed to fade away
content.summary: Saw three lights in sky then over 20 military planes/helicopters going to the lights

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo activity in the edmonton area has increased dramatically in the last few weeks. i have been able to get glimpses of them every day and as a result i have ordered a high definition camcorder with night vision from the us and intend to capture these phenomenon on video. for practice, and because i am getting better at spotting them i took a regular camera outside at about 6 am this morning to see if i could get one on camera. i did. it was difficult as they do not show up in the view finder and they travel extremely fast. so one just has to "shoot from the hip" so to speak.
in the photo attached you can see the ufo to the far right, above the last blue star.
content.summary: Meandering, hovering, moving extermly fast, travelling in arcs

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo activity in the edmonton area has increased dramatically in the last few weeks. i have been able to get glimpses of them every day and as a result i have ordered a high definition camcorder with night vision from the us and intend to capture these phenomenon on video. for practice, and because i am getting better at spotting them i took a regular camera outside at about 6 am this morning to see if i could get one on camera. i did. it was difficult as they do not show up in the view finder and they travel extremely fast. so one just has to "shoot from the hip" so to speak.
in the photo attached you can see the ufo to the far right, above the last blue star.
content.summary: Meandering, hovering, moving extermly fast, travelling in arcs

content.detailedDescription:
Got home from work around 11:45. noticed blinky human craft in sky. ive seen them every night and saw another ufo 2 nights ago but did not report it.
i them stepped out of my car and literally stood outside freezing for an hour observing 1 of 3 ufos. they had very bright green lights with some kind of orange flashing lights. i used binoculars but i could only make out these two lights. there were 3 of these each in seperate parts of the sky.
something is going on for sure.

saw stealth bomber shaped plane with regular flashy lights low to ground circling the area (horizon) near one of 3 ufos. the most prominent ufo just hover and veered from left to right and up and down and glowed blue green.

also i was a little bit alarmed by the howling of every animal in my neighborhood all at once every couple of minutes.

the way the brightest ufo seemed to maneuver was akin to evading some type of attack, perhaps from the obvious human crafts i saw circling around the sky.

that is only a theory however.
i will report more if i keep witnessing this.

also nothing changed, i just had to go inside because i was freezing to death.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw stealth bomber shaped plane with regular flashy lights low to ground circling the area (horizon) near one of 3 ufos. the most prominent ufo just hover and veered from left to right and up and down and glowed blue green.

content.detailedDescription:
Was on the interstate and noticed a glowing triangle in the sky.
was all one color . several military planes were flying around it.
it was shooting up and down , back and forth, even did what looked like a flip. then would randomly disapare then came back.

made a call on my cell phone and suddenly loss power in it, then my car started to lose power and then i seen the ufo again.  then power suddenly came back.
then pulled in a gas station to take a picture and my phone shut off and wouldn't power back up until the thing shot off again.
people were talking about it in the station. 

called my parents and they turned the police scanner on and there was talk of it.
several area residents home and phone services went down randomly . i'm unsure as to how long.

but i don't know anything about the other witnesses . so i will not provide them in my report.
content.summary: Glowing triangle in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Was on the interstate and noticed a glowing triangle in the sky.
was all one color . several military planes were flying around it.
it was shooting up and down , back and forth, even did what looked like a flip. then would randomly disapare then came back.

made a call on my cell phone and suddenly loss power in it, then my car started to lose power and then i seen the ufo again.  then power suddenly came back.
then pulled in a gas station to take a picture and my phone shut off and wouldn't power back up until the thing shot off again.
people were talking about it in the station. 

called my parents and they turned the police scanner on and there was talk of it.
several area residents home and phone services went down randomly . i'm unsure as to how long.
content.summary: Glowing triangle in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I reviewed pictures of the royal wedding that i took from my television on april 29, 2011. upon reviewing the photos i discovered two "very unusual" beings sitting on my landing watching me through a mirror that reflects into both rooms. every person that i have showed this picture to says, "it looks like aliens." this has really bothered me and i would really like this picture to be examined by someone that can tell me what i am seeing in this photo. i have to say these "things" look like nothing i have ever seen nor want to see. i hope they are not here all the time and i don't know it for i never have taken pictures of anything on my tv before this day.
content.summary: I caught a picture of two unknown weird alien-like "things" in my house sitting on my stair landing.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving down the street when i looked up and saw 3 extremely large, irregular flight path  contrails.  as there are many contrails around here, i wouldn't have thought much about them- except that they were so large and on a very irregular flight path.  no type of aircraft that would leave a contrail that i am aware of flies in that manner........And it looked very strange. in addition, they appeared to be significantly lower than most contrails one sees on a regular basis.  observing these while driving, i then noticed there were 2 jets at an apparently very high altitude (you couldn't see the jets- just the contrails they were making) following these very large, irregularly shaped contrails from way above .  then i turned to look at the other end of the  very large, irregularly shaped contrails, and there were 4 additional  jets following the same irregularly shaped contrails (a total of 6 additional contrails in addition to the irregularly shaped 3 contrails.) the "regular" contrails of the 4 jets (which you could see the planes that were making them- so they were significantly "lower" than the other 2 "regular" contrails) were very close together- as though "flying in formation".  it was very unusual, and 3 people personally witnessed these, as well. in total, there were 9 contrails- only 6 that appeared on a "normal" flight path (not in a "convoluted" manner). the 3 convoluted contrails were headed south to north.  in addition, this morning at 7:35 a.M., i noticed there was 1 convoluted, very large contrail going from east to west,but there was only 1, and i saw only 1 other "normal" contrail following that flight path(in a "normal" straight line through the convoluted contrail)- so i didn't think too much of it until i saw the 3 this afternoon. then when i saw a ufo report in lansing, mi (pretty much west of here), i was wondering if there might be some type of connection..........There is no need to contact me, as this is all the info i have, but thought it might be of some use in the event there are other reports of strange sightings in this area.
content.summary: 3 extremely large, convoluted contrails on irregular path

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling north on 127 in ingham county in lansing, mi.  i had just passed the jolly road exit.  a few moments after i had passed the jolly road exit, i noticed what appeared to be a silvery/grey object in the with orange in, and around it.  the object resembled a fighter plane, with a bubble dome from my view point.  traveling north, i saw this object to my left slightly.  you could say directional wise it was ne.  i can guess as to where it was landing.  it was well before the 496 entrance ramp, so anywhere in the area of fenner arboretum or maybe even more east as there is unpopulated land there.  if this object were a plane, it would've definately crashed, no doubt about it.  the only other thing i can guess is that it was a helicopter making a rescue, but i heard no helicopter noise, and at its altitude, you should've heard it.  

the time was between 12:20 and 12:45.  the time above is guestimate.

thank you
content.summary: Orange like color almost appearing to be a flame on a craft descending.

content.detailedDescription: so mt bro and i were outside smokin a butt when we saw it. i was facing west when it came out from behind the house. at first i only noticed one light, kind of an orange orb with a red light inside of it with a yellow beam of light coming out of the top of it. it was at tree top level. i looked at it for a second waiting to see flashing lights like on a normal aircraft when i realized it was right there in front of me no more then 100ft away from us.We began running across the yard when i noticed that the light was one of three lights on a large triangle that had to be bigger then a football field. my heart wass pounding out of my chest and we were both kinda slack jawed looking at it. it moved from north to south along side the house when we both noticed a large misty green opening in the sky. it looked like a hanger door with frame work inside it floating in the sky. and yes once the triangle was inside the green opening it all vanished. i know it sounds crazy but we both saw the same thing, i was in the army for six years working on hellacopters on an army/airforce airfield. i've seen a lot of aircraft in my time in iraq. if someone could get in touch with us we could tell our story much better then i could ever type it.
content.summary: My bro and myself were no more then 100ft from it as it went by

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 11:09 p.M., est, february 6, 2012. i sighted a bright white light appearing to be about 75' above a nearby mountain.  the light remained constant and stationary until 11:19 at which time it began to slowly descend below the treeline and disappear.  this is the third such observation of lights in this area since feb. 2, 2012.  sometimes they appear higher/lower in the sky but always display the same pattern of being stationary with constant light and slow descents. the placement of the sighted lights has been variable, i.E. sometimes visable at a higher point on the slope of the mountain.
content.summary: At approx. 11:09 p.M. est, feb 6, 2012,  i sighted a bright white light appearing to be about 75' above a nearby mountain.  the light remained constant and stationary until 11:19 at which time it began to slowly descend below the treeline and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 11:09 p.M., est, february 6, 2012. i sighted a bright white light appearing to be about 75' above a nearby mountain.  the light remained constant and stationary until 11:19 at which time it began to slowly descend below the treeline and disappear.  this is the third such observation of lights in this area since feb. 2, 2012.  sometimes they appear higher/lower in the sky but always display the same pattern of being stationary with constant light and slow descents. the placement of the sighted lights has been variable, i.E. sometimes visable at a higher point on the slope of the mountain.
content.summary: At approx. 11:09 p.M. est, feb 6, 2012,  i sighted a bright white light appearing to be about 75' above a nearby mountain.  the light remained constant and stationary until 11:19 at which time it began to slowly descend below the treeline and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were driving home from the movie theater traveling south on 30 th st west when to our right we could see a craft of some sort hovering in the air. it hovered like a helicopter but too high in the air to be one. we watched (clear night) and then suddenly it took off and vanished, literally vanished! then within a few moments it came back in view and then a few moments later it took off and vanished again. we were driving and did look around the sky to see if we could see again but we didn't. it was definitely a flying machine of some sort and lightening fast. it must of had the capability to either travel at the speed of light or be invisible. i've heard rumors that the military bases around here have these anti-gravity craft...After seeing this, i believe it.
content.summary: Saw flying craft that hovered like a helicopter and took off at the speed of light.

content.detailedDescription: Unknown object caught on traffic camera, those who witnessed the incident haven't come forward
content.summary: Unknown object caught on traffic camera

content.detailedDescription: We were driving around town in the lower valley area. i looked up at the sky because i had seen a bright light then i realize the aircraft was still there. i thought it was a helicopter so we drove closer to the residential area and lowered the windows to see if it made any sound. the craft was hover silently eerily. then proceeded to move west toward las cruces, nm. we decided to drive in the direction the craft was going. we noticed 1 other car who stopped to the side of the road to look at the object we kept following it but it seemed to be moving fast we were going around 40 mph. we followed it all through downtown el paso. it seemed to be flying in between the border of el paso and juarez. my boyfriend is retired military and he strongly believed that it couldn't of been a military craft let alone a helicopter since he had been in various black-hawks before. we lost sight of the object due to traffic and the fact that it kept going at a steady pace west.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange air craft hovering in residential area and continuing an aerial path

content.detailedDescription: It was just after a birthday dinner when i was standing outside with a couple of my friends, my fiance, and mother. while staring up at the moon i noticed that below it and to the right was a small row of lights that was staying in one place but tilted to the right. they kind of pulsated and changed colors from blue, to green, to red, to white, and that was how i distinguished it wasn't any kind of star. i immediately pointed it out to everyone around me when i noticed the exact same set of lights tilted in the exact same way a mile or so to the right of that. we had sat there and stared back and forth for quite some time at these lights that were completely still but randomly changing colors of all sorts, we decided to finish our journey home and keep an eye on the sky. we figured that maybe we could distinguish if it happened to be a floating satelite or some kind of plane if we traveled to the other side of the city and checked it out there. we were pulling up on the street to my house which is a very slow quiet street and the moon happened to be right in front of me, so i figured it was safe enough to take a glance and see if i saw the same lights when much to my surprise i saw much more than that, we saw a hovering orange light that seemed much closer in the atmosphere. this bright orange orb glowed, lightly pulsated, and was also stationary. my mother was never able to see the slanted flashing lights because she didn't have her glasses (3 other people including myself saw them), but this orb stood out more than anything else in the sky, it was pretty hard to miss. all of us were in such shock that i immediatly stopped the car in the middle of the road and slammed it in park to get out my camera phone when we watched it fade out as if it was taking off into the atmosphere. those stationary lights also remained in the sky for an hour or 2 before also disappearing. i tried to get any kind of footage but they would not show up on my camera. all of us are completely shocked and have been obsessed about finding out more information. apparently these orange orb ufo's are pretty common and i have found footage of what i have seen by searching "orange orb ufo".. i linked a video i believe looks almost exactly like what we saw
content.summary: 2 types of ufo in 1 night, 5 witnesses - orange orb and flashing lights - utah

content.detailedDescription:
i was standing on my balcony looking east toward the foothills, i saw a bald eagle soaring over head, and i went inside to retrieve my binoculars. i said to my wife, there's a bald eagle out here do you want to see it. she replied, no.
so i���m out watching this eagle soaring around for about a minute then in my view i caught sight of a sphere in the lower part of the binocular, it was white-ish in color, kind of like the color of a cloud, it had a soft glow to it, almost a translucent, i watched it for a minute or so before i couldn't track it any longer due to the other apt building obscuring the path the ufo was on. i knew it was a ufo when i saw it, i have seen a ufo one other time in my life, i was ten at the time of that sighting. i listen to george noory on coast to coast every night at work and on the way home from work.
content.summary: I was standing on my balcony watching a bald eagle with my binoculars, when a lighted sphere came into my view through the binoculars, i watch it until i couldn't track it any longer

content.detailedDescription: Let me say first i thought my report was submitted, but it didn't send. on january 18th between the times of 20:20 and 20:30, i was out on my back deck with my girlfriend and our daughter. i saw a cigar shaped object with two orange/yellow lights. the lights appeared large and one was in the mid front of the object and one was toward the mid back. the object moved quickly on a very flat trajectory as if on a line. we watched the object as it went across the sky from the southeast to the northwest. the object was low in the sky at about 500 feet or less. it made no sound. the object behind it did make a lot of noise. a jet appeared to be chasing this object. the jet was as low and on the same flight path as the object. the jet was about a half a mile to three-quarters of a mile behind the object. it was so loud and low all the dogs and coyotes in the area started howling. we watched as the jet continued off to the northwest toward the cites of pocola, ok and fort smith, ar. as for the size of the object i can only say it appeared as large as the aircraft behind it. my girlfriend observed the same object with me but she said to her the lights appeared more red and there appeared to be four lights in back that did not blink. i wanted to report her sighting too as we witnessed it together but saw differences in the lights on the object. my daughter is only three as she was just frightened by all of the animals howling.
content.summary: A cigar shaped object with two orange/yellow non blinking lights was being persued by a jet
